article:
Dragon Boat Festival is _ . It is a holiday _ a long history. We all have a _ during Dragon Boat Festival. Because Dragon Boat Festival is a(n) _ and interesting festival in China. It comes in the _ lunar   month around the middle June.
People celebrate  it _ many ways. One of them is to have dragon boat races. Dragon boats are _ and special. More than ten people _ on a boat. They often get everything ready   _ the race comes. They practice more because they want to have _ results. Lots of people come to _ and enjoy the race.
In some cities, it is a festival for the children . Children _ red and yellow strings  . With these, they think they will get away from the ghosts . Parents buy sweets and other delicious food _ their children. They usually get together to _ a big dinner on that day.
